wisdomText: If you're interested in coding as a career/hobby, this is the best place for you to start!
Everyone thinks coding is all about what languages you know, but this video teachs you how to THINK like a programmer!
These games are very fun to play, but even more fun to code! Take a look!
First-person shooters are so much fun, but can be tough! Check out these aiming tips!
Mouse & Keyboard vs. Controller. See which one fits you best!
Here you'll find a really nice video on keeping in peak physical fitness! Reach out to me with any questions!
This is a short 7 minute workout that is guaranteed to have you feeling stronger in only a matter of weeks! Be sure to watch over your diet when using this workout!
Everyone knows that working out can be tough to make a habit of. Don't be discouraged, just follow your goals to the best of your abilities!
If your goal is to gain as much mass as physically possible, then this is the video you need! Pay close attention to Arnold, he knows what he's talking about!
Taxes can be super tough to do, so follow this video as a starter to tackling your taxes. You got this!
Ok honestly, nobody uses checks anymore. However, if you learn how, it could be a cool party trick or something!
As a first-time bank account owner, this video guides you on what bank statements are, and what to do with them!
Parenting is one of the greatest challenges we know, so watch this closely and you will do amazing!
Before you set your mind on how you want to be a parent, try opening your mind to different perspectives every now and then!
Sometimes people forget that they need to raise themselves before their kids, so take time to reflect on you and your health.
Music can be much more complicated than you might think! Here we discuss music theory effectively!
